const styles = theme => ({
    header: {
        margin: '0 auto',
        position: 'relative',
        zIndex: '100',
        display: 'block',
        [theme.breakpoints.down('md')]: {
            textAlign: 'center',
        },
    },
    backgroundMenuHomepage: {
        backgroundColor: '#f0f0f0',

    },
    customMenuHomepage: {
        paddingTop: '15px',
        marginRight: '-15px',
        marginLeft: '-15px',

    },
    colMd3: {
        paddingRight: '0',
        position: 'relative',
        minHeight: '1px',
        paddingLeft: '15px',
        display: 'none',
        [theme.breakpoints.up('md')]: {
            display: 'block',
            width: '25%',
            float: 'left',
        },
    },
    vesVerticalmenu: {
        zIndex: '999',
        marginBottom: '0 !important',
        background: '#f7941e',
        position: 'relative',
        border: '1px solid #e6e6e6',
        boxShadow: '0 0 2px rgba(0,0,0,.1)',
        [theme.breakpoints.down('md')]: {
            background: 'transparent !important',
            border: '0 solid !important',
            display: 'none !important',
        },
    },
    blockTitle: {
        width: '100%',
        padding: '0 20px',
        letterSpacing: '0',
        borderBottom: '0',
        minHeight: '35px',
        lineHeight: '35px',
        textAlign: 'center',
        background: 'none',
        color: '#6a6a6a',
        position: 'relative',
        fontFamily: '"Poppins",sans-serif',
        fontSize: '20px',
        fontWeight: '600',
        [theme.breakpoints.down('md')]: {
            display: 'none!important',
        },
    },
    shapesRight: {
        width: '0',
        height: '0',
        backgroundColor: 'transparent',
        position: 'absolute',
        float: 'right !important',
    },
    line: {

    },
    blockContent: {
        padding: '0 !important',
        display: 'block',
        width: '100%',
        visibility: 'visible',
        position: 'absolute',
        [theme.breakpoints.down('md')]: {
            border: '0 solid !important',
            position: 'relative !important',
        },
        [theme.breakpoints.down('sm')]: {
            left: '0',
            opacity: '1',
            top: '0',
        },

    },
    navbarInverse: {
        margin: '0',
        background: '#fff',
        border: '0',
        borderRadius: '5px',
        position: 'relative',
        minHeight: '50px',
        [theme.breakpoints.down('md')]: {
            background: 'transparent !important',
            marginBottom: '0 !important',
        },
        [theme.breakpoints.down('sm')]: {
            border: '0 !important',
            borderRadius: '0',
            padding: '0',
        },
    },
    navbar: {
        border: '0',
        margin: '0',
        background: 'transparent',
        borderRadius: '5px',
        position: 'relative',
        minHeight: '50px',
        [theme.breakpoints.down('md')]: {
            marginBottom: '0!important',
        },
        [theme.breakpoints.down('sm')]: {
            border: '0!important',
            borderRadius: '0!important',
            padding: '0!important',
        },
    },
    navbarCollapse: {
        margin: '0',
        padding: '0',
        borderColor: '#101010',
        display: 'block',
        height: 'auto!important',
        overflow: 'visible !important',
        width: 'auto',
        borderTop: '0',
        boxShadow: 'none',
        maxHeight: '340px',
        [theme.breakpoints.down('md')]: {
            display: 'none!important'
        },
    },
    navbarNav: {
        position: 'static',
        float: 'none',
        width: '100%',
        padding: '0',
        margin: '0',
        listStyle: 'none',
    }
})

class Header extends Component {
    render(){
        const {classes} = this.props;
        return(
            <section id="header" className={classes.header}>
                
                <div className={classes.backgroundMenuHomepage}>
                    <div className="container">
                        <div className={classes.customMenuHomepage}>
                            <div className={classes.colMd3}>
                                <div id="ves-verticalmenu" className={classes.vesVerticalmenu}>
                                    <div className={classes.blockTitle}>
                                        <span>Danh mục sản phẩm</span>
                                        <em className={classes.shapesRight}></em>
                                        <em className={classes.line}></em>
                                    </div>
                                    <div className={classes.blockContent}>
                                        <div className={classes.navbarInverse}>
                                            <div id="verticalmenu" className={"verticalmenu offset-canvas-menu-play"} role="navigation" data-offcanvas="true">
                                                <div className="navbar">
                                                    
                                                    <div className="collapse navbar-collapse navbar-ex1-collapse">
                                                        <ul className="nav navbar-nav vertical menu">
                                                            {contents.map((content, i) => {
                                                                return <BlockContent {...content} key={i} />
                                                            })}
                                                        </ul>
                                                    </div>
                                                </div>
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                            </div>
                            <div className="col-md-9">
                                <div className="container-inner">
                                    <div className="container-inner">
                                        <div className="row">
                                            <div className="col-sms12 col-md-12 col-sm-12">
                                                <div className="inivoslider swiper-container swiper-container-horizontal">
                                                    <div className="slider-header">
                                                        <SlideShow 
                                                            input={collections}
                                                            ratio={`3:2`}
                                                            mode={`automatic`}
                                                            timeout={`3000`}
                                                        />
                                                    </div>
                                                </div>
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                    </div>
                </div>
            </section>
            
        );
    }
}



export default withStyles(styles)(Header);
